title: Ducsu VP calls for siege of home adviserâ€™s office
body: Dhaka University Central Students' Union (Ducsu) Vice-President Abu Shadik Kayem on Sunday night called for a siege of the home adviser's office on Monday. In a post from his verified Facebook account, Shadik said they would demand the arrest of "terrorists involved in the shooting and attempted killing of our brother Osman Hadi." They will also call for a nationwide drive to recover illegal firearms and the arrest of "terrorists of the banned political organisation." Shadik urged students to gather in front of the Ducsu building at 12:00pm on Monday, to start the march.
